n=int(input())
arr= list(map(int,input().strip().split(' ')))
s = 0
for i in range(n):
   s+=abs(arr[i])
print(s)

n = int(input())
a = [int(v) for v in input().split()]

print(sum(abs(v) for v in a))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
ans = 0
for i in a:
    ans += abs(i)

print(ans)

n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
b = [i for i in a if i >= 0]
c = [i for i in a if i < 0]
print(sum(b) - sum(c))

a=list(map(int,input().split()))
print(sum(x for x in a if x > 0)-sum([x for x in a if x<0]))

n = int(input())
v = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
ans = 0
for x in v:
	ans += x if x > 0 else -x
print(ans)

n = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))
L = list(map(abs, L))
print(sum(L))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = [i for i in a if i < 0]
print(sum(a) - 2 * sum(b))

R=lambda:map(int,input().split())

n = int(input())

a = list(R())

s = 0 

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] >= 0:
        s += a[i]
    else: s -= a[i]
    
print(s)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b=[i for i in a if i > 0]
c=[i for i in a if i <= 0]
sb = 0
sc = 0
if len(b) > 0:
    sb = sum(b)
if len(c) > 0:
    sc = sum(c)
print(sb-sc)

input()
print(sum(map(abs, map(int, input().split()))))

n=int(input())
a=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
b=0
c=0
for i in range(len(a)):
    if a[i]<0:
        c+=a[i]*(-1)
    elif a[i]>=0:
        b+=a[i]
ans=b+c
print(ans)

n = int(input())
a= list(map(int,input().split()))
for i in range(len(a)):
    a[i] = abs(a[i])
print(sum(a))
